title: Potion Master

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may use a Protect or Reveal Potion on another player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Protect Potions grant the target Powerful Defense, and cure Poison.
- Reveal Potions will reveal the target's role to all Coven members.
- With the Necronomicon, you gain the ability to use an Attack Potion, dealing a Basic Attack to a target.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

desc:
Post 3867
*I think Coven roles in general were reworked to have closer to a consistent 1 KPN, with the Necronomicon maintaining that. So it's more boring.*
